responsibilities: Develop and lead projects, team ideas, and mentor junior engineers.
Conduct advanced research and engineering on AI-based rendering techniques including but not limited to Neural Rendering acceleration, Neural material representation, Neural Texture Compression, etc.
Transfer advanced research AI/CG solutions to solving real-world problems that will be integrated in various Huawei products.
Provide expert opinions on relevant fields by summarizing research findings in high-quality papers or patents.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on AI-based rendering techniques, advanced research, and integration of solutions into Huawei products. There is no mention of language models or tasks related to fine-tuning or customizing them for domain-specific tasks. The responsibilities are more aligned with AI/CG solutions rather than language models.
